post.title: List of Resources to Easily Crack Your Next JavaScript/React Interview
post.description: List of 1000 JavaScript Interview Questions   A very popular resource for the collection of...
post.body_html:
List of 1000 JavaScript Interview Questions

A very popular resource for the collection of 1000 JavaScript interview questions along with answers.

37 Essential JavaScript Interview Questions

A great list of questions including the frequently asked predict the output type of questions along with the explanation of answers.

JavaScript Modern Interview Code Challenges

A collection of programming code challenge type of questions along with answers.

30 Seconds of Interviews

A really nice collection of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node and Security related interview questions.

7 Simple but Tricky JavaScript Interview Questions

A list of 7 tricky and not so easy to understand interview questions.

Front-End Interview Handbook

A great list of HTML, CSS and JavaScript interview questions.

500 ReactJS Interview Questions & Answers

A great collection of interview questions with the answers.

Thanks for reading!

Want to learn all ES6+ features in detail including let and const, promises, various promise methods, array and object destructuring, arrow functions, async/await, import and export and a whole lot more from scratch?

Check out my Mastering Modern JavaScript book. This book covers all the pre-requisites for learning React and helps you to become better at JavaScript and React.

Check out free preview contents of the book here.

Also, you can check out my free Introduction to React Router course to learn React Router from scratch.

Want to stay up to date with regular content regarding JavaScript, React, Node.js? Follow me on LinkedIn.
post.body_markdown: List of 1000 JavaScript Interview Questions](https://github.com/sudheerj/javascript-interview-questions) A very popular resource for the collection of 1000 JavaScript interview questions along with answers. ![sudheer_js.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617038209525/QwLs1mtSg.png) ## [37 Essential JavaScript Interview Questions](https://www.toptal.com/javascript/interview-questions) A great list of questions including the frequently asked predict the output type of questions along with the explanation of answers. ![toptal_js.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617038576674/a5gXDpVFe.png) ## [JavaScript Modern Interview Code Challenges](https://github.com/sadanandpai/javascript-code-challenges) A collection of programming code challenge type of questions along with answers. ![code_challenges.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617038945424/hQQSHFwZp.png) ## [30 Seconds of Interviews](https://30secondsofinterviews.org/) A really nice collection of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node and Security related interview questions. ![30_seconds.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617039194799/DVZdsbN46.png) ## [7 Simple but Tricky JavaScript Interview Questions](https://dmitripavlutin.com/simple-but-tricky-javascript-interview-questions/) A list of 7 tricky and not so easy to understand interview questions. ![tricky_questions.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617039777245/cg3zUVu4K.png) ## [Front-End Interview Handbook](https://github.com/yangshun/front-end-interview-handbook) A great list of HTML, CSS and JavaScript interview questions. ![interview_handbook.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617039995736/mjKhpumLf.png) ## [500 ReactJS Interview Questions & Answers](https://github.com/sudheerj/reactjs-interview-questions) A great collection of interview questions with the answers. ![react_questions.png](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1617081003681/X4T_wtCj5.png) --- ### Thanks for reading! Want to learn all ES6+ features in detail including let and const, promises, various promise methods, array and object destructuring, arrow functions, async/await, import and export and a whole lot more from scratch? Check out my [Mastering Modern JavaScript](https://modernjavascript.yogeshchavan.dev/) book. This book covers all the pre-requisites for learning React and helps you to become better at JavaScript and React. **Check out free preview contents of the book [here](https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/learn-modern-javascript/).** Also, you can check out my **free** [Introduction to React Router](https://yogeshchavan.podia.com/react-router-introduction) course to learn React Router from scratch. Want to stay up to date with regular content regarding JavaScript, React, Node.js? [Follow me on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yogesh-chavan97/).
